name: 2024 9th International Conference on Mathematics and Artificial Intelligence
content: Publication: The ISBN number assigned to ICMAI 2024 is 979-8-4007-1728-4 Submitted paper will be peer reviewed by conference committees, and accepted papers will be included into ICMAI 2024 Conference Proceedings, which will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series and will be archived in the Online Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science)
